text: Blue Skies is a 1946 American musical movie directed by Stuart Heisler and Mark Sandrich and starring Bing Crosby, Fred Astaire, Joan Caulfield, Billy De Wolfe, Olga San Juan, Mikhail Rasumny, Frank Faylen. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1947. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies directed by Stuart Heisler Category:Movies directed by Mark Sandrich Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Blue Skies (movie)
